com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint

Class ContextSplitting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint.ConstraintSplitting
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint.ContextSplitting

  • @Beta
public class ContextSplitting
extends ConstraintSplitting
    A specialization of ConstraintSplitting for Context.
    Author:
    braz

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint.ConstraintSplitting

        ConstraintSplitting.Result

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextSplitting(Expression literal, Context context)
      Splits given constraint by given literal and stores the result and other information (see methods).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context getConstraint()
      The original constraint being split.
      Context getConstraintAndLiteral()
      Return conjunction of constraint and literal (context is not conjoined; it is only used to decide whether conjunction of constraint and literal is satisfiable).
      Context getConstraintAndLiteralNegation()
      Return conjunction of constraint and literal negation (context is not conjoined; it is only used to decide whether conjunction of constraint and literal is satisfiable).
      Context getContext()
      Same thing as getConstraint(), but with a specialized name.
      Context getContextAndLiteral()
      Same thing as getConstraintAndLiteral(), but with a specialized name.
      Context getContextAndLiteralNegation()
      Same thing as getConstraintAndLiteralNegation(), but with a specialized name.
